namesection.name: dbi
namesection.desc: package with interface for SQL database access in Tcl

section.title: DESCRIPTION
section.p: The dbi package contains the definition of the dbi interface and some associated tools. The dbi interface is further described in interface_dbi. The package can be loaded using the commands "package require dbi".

commanddef.desc: Returns a list of all packages loaded or available that start with dbi_ (and should provide a dbi backend)
